Location:		UAE – Dubai

CAREER SUMMARY
May 2019 to date Firmenich UAE
Position: HR Generalist, MENA
World’s largest privately owned Fragrance and Taste company. Firmenich ranks no. 1 worldwide in Fine Fragrance and Ingredients. With 10,000 employees, presence in 100+ markets and CHF 3.9bn+ group turnover in FY20.
Partner with the business ensuring HR proximity, leading transformation and people growth
Deliver on HR functional excellence, managing the full employee cycle and ensuring positive employee experience

CAREER SUMMARY
May 2019 to date Firmenich UAE
Position: HR Generalist, MENA
World’s largest privately owned Fragrance and Taste company. Firmenich ranks no. 1 worldwide in Fine Fragrance and Ingredients. With 10,000 employees, presence in 100+ markets and CHF 3.9bn+ group turnover in FY20.
Partner with the business ensuring HR proximity, leading transformation and people growth
Deliver on HR functional excellence, managing the full employee cycle and ensuring positive employee experience
lead recruitment to support the business growth while driving effective collaboration with business on talent pipeline
Review the Attraction and Recruitment Policy. Build and implement Employer branding regional strategy
Implement the new performance management system focusing on performance and behavioural goals and ongoing feedback
Lead Rewards (benchmarking process, benefits review, compensation, Annual Salary Review, conduct salary surveys)
Inclusive Diversity Champion for the Middle East region, responsible to implement Middle East roadmap
Implement controversial HR policies (extended maternity leave, working from home, flexi hours, increased paternity leave and company products to all employees).
Manage the Pulse Survey to drive attraction and engagement
Train people managers in recruiting, induction, reward, performance management, disciplinary and exit procedures.
Create and implement Training Plan at all levels. Launched L&D programs: Sales Development Journey, Internal Facilitators, and Executive Coaching.
Contribute to the HR Regional Strategy formulation together with the HR Director.
Manage the implementation of the 360 Degrees Feedback Survey tool, Mentoring Program and Coaching Program, which leads to increased performance management and capabilities in the region
Design the local Engagement and Wellbeing annual program
March 2018 to May 2019 Union Insurance Company, UAE
Position: HR Business Partner
Own the recruitment and selection process; sourcing, selecting, and onboarding employees
Lead a team of 2 HR professionals; HRIS Specialist and HR Operations Senior Officer
Own the revamping of the performance management process & forms and deliver trainings to HQ
Provide support to managers to retain employees, reduce labor turn over and encourage internal promotion (Succession Planning)
Assist in strategy development, planning and execution of Positive Employee Relations initiatives
Actively identify HR processes and policies gaps, propose and implement changes necessary
Design and maintain organization structure as the performance of the business unit improves
Design and implement diverse HR projects and exercises; Employer Branding, Employee Referral Program, Emiratization, Candidate Experience and Employee Engagement
Manage and execute monthly payroll process. Develop payroll implementation on the HR system
Design and manage benefits plan in terms of Corporate Mobile Plans deals, Medical Insurance Plans and Benefits, Housing Allowance, Car Allowance, Bonus, cost of living Increment etc..
Run the performance appraisal exercise biannually and prepare the bonus and profit share
July 2016 to March 2017 Valeo
Position: Recruitment Leader
A multinational automotive supplier based in France, providing a wide range of products to auto manufacturers and after-markets.
Partner with stakeholders and develop recruiting strategies meeting current & future staffing needs
Conduct performance evaluations and career development discussions/plans
Hired an average of 280 employees over one year (expanded with a HC capacity of 200)
Execute end to end recruitment process and conduct Competency Based interviews
Manage sourcing; headhunting, graduate programs, educational partnerships, referrals, etc
Develop and prepare recruitment team metrics, KPIs and reports (time to hire, cost per hire, etc)
Create job profiles and job descriptions as well as main

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
